name: Guaca-Mole!
description:
A short Metroid-vania concept where you (as a mole) get to the bottom of the Burrito-Snake's Burrow and retrieve your stolen Guacamole.

Fight Rolling Taco-Armadillos and Soaring Nacho-Bats to get to the bottom!

Left Click to Attack
Left Click + S/Down Arrow to Spoon-Dive (once you unlock the ability)
Right Click to dig into the wall
WASD or Arrows to move
Spacebar to Jump

Collect Stamina Beans to increase your maximum stamina!

This is a submission for the Ludum Dare 48 Jam! The theme was "deeper and deeper"
